name: Fortinet FortiSIEM操作系统命令注入漏洞（CNVD-2025-21176）
product: ["Fortinet FortiSIEM 5.4.0", "Fortinet FortiSIEM >=7.3.0\uff0c<=7.3.1", "Fortinet FortiSIEM >=7.2.0\uff0c<=7.2.5", "Fortinet FortiSIEM >=7.1.0\uff0c<=7.1.7", "Fortinet FortiSIEM >=7.0.0\uff0c<=7.0.3", "Fortinet FortiSIEM >=6.7.0\uff0c<=6.7.9", "Fortinet FortiSIEM >=6.6.0\uff0c<=6.6.5", "Fortinet FortiSIEM >=6.5.0\uff0c<=6.5.3", "Fortinet FortiSIEM >=6.4.0\uff0c<=6.4.4", "Fortinet FortiSIEM >=6.3.0\uff0c<=6.3.3", "Fortinet FortiSIEM >=6.2.0\uff0c<=6.2.1", "Fortinet FortiSIEM >=6.1.0\uff0c<=6.1.2"]
description: Fortinet FortiSIEM是美国飞塔（Fortinet）公司的一套安全信息和事件管理系统。该系统包括资产发现、工作流程自动化和统一管理等功能。Fortinet FortiSIEM存在操作系统命令注入漏洞，该漏洞源于应用未能正确过滤构造命令特殊字符、命令等，攻击者可利用该漏洞可能导致执行任意代码。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://docs.fortinet.com/upgrade-tool/fortigate
patch: Fortinet FortiSIEM操作系统命令注入漏洞（CNVD-2025-21176）的补丁
